Detailed Description

Reciprocal operator.

Inverse recip__a_or_c checks for "divide by zero". The "safe" reciprocal is 1/x except when x is zero then it is set to std::numeric_limits<double>::max().

If you need a numerically safe product operator, use safrecip.cc instead.
